page.title: 06Housing in Staining Class 3
page.content: Housing covers about 1/4 of the whole of our block. It is divided into the four main types:Detached,Semi-detached Terraced or Bungalows. In the Eastern half of our block most people live in detached or semi-detached houses but in Western half of the block there are more terraced houses. There are very few blocks of flats in our block. Such as there are tend to be expensive ones rising to two or three levels. They tend to be privately owned as is most of housing in the area. There is one large housing estate called Grange Park. This is a Council estate. Most of the children who worked on this item in the survey live in semi-det houses with gardens front and back and a garage. These houses are owner occupied as are nearly all the homes in our village. Most of our houses were built in the 1960s but some are 18thC.
